name: Agent Avenge
description:
This was my first game of the semester.  We were put on a 2-man team, with me programming and Sean Agnew as artist. The result of the 2-week dev cycle was Agent Avenge: a 2D top down stealth/avoidance game with some story to go with it. 

I was really happy with how this came out, given that I was adjusting to even the idea of using GameMaker for anything serious.  Turns out it's quite robust for 2D games, and excellent for quick prototyping.
